transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Helm of Wrath

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Increases effectiveness of Blasphemite secondary effects by 25%.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Gauntlets of Wrath

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 260,527 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 15,265. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Cloak of Wrath

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 128,227 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
